response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for us both. This unique item is worth $1,000,000 to you and represents a significant investment in your future endeavors. I am extending this exclusive offer to you at a special price of $800,000. This is a generous discount, allowing you to secure a piece that could potentially be worth much more in the future. I believe this is a fair deal that reflects the true worth of the product while also providing you with substantial savings. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 800000}
